mapper.select: select type,total_num as totalNum,access_num as accessNum,percent_num as percentNum,stat_date as statDate from d_cun_partner_access where stat_date > #{statDate}

select a.name as stationName,a.taobao_user_id as taobaoUserId,a.id as stationId,c.id as orgId,c.temp_full_name_path as orgFullNamePath from station a,cuntao_org c, (select taobao_user_id from d_cun_notlogin_partner where stat_date > #{statDate} group by taobao_user_id having(count(0) = #{dayNum}))b where a.taobao_user_id=b.taobao_user_id and a.is_deleted ='n' and a.apply_org=c.id and c.is_deleted='n'
